name: Match Tree
description:
In 2004, did you ever want to find love? Well, now you can go back in time and experience it first-hand!

Welcome to Match Tree!

This is Match tree, a game about the joy of dating sims mixed with the nostalgia of the 2000s. The site "Sitting in a Tree" gives you a list of people looking for love, and you must choose the best path in your chats to successfully get a first date (which is being added later) with your match!

In this initial release, you have 2 matches (with a random chance of a 3rd spawning, OoOOooo) you can attempt to get a first date with. Be careful! If you upset them, you could get blocked. Towards the end of your talk, the match will decide if they want to go out or not.

You also have several wallpaper and profile picture options.

- Controls - 

Mouse to click, and press any key to type. You can press enter or click the "send" button to send a message, either works.

- The Team  - 

Sandii Snooters - Main Artist and Writer

ThatMegalosaurus - Main Coder and Writer

- Other Credits -

lexartstudio - Main Character's Artwork (the really pretty ones)

freesound.org + fesliyanstudios.com  for sounds and music.

MORE WILL COME TO THE GAME! We are just taking our time to do so. :)
